title: Mac Client - Reinstall every time i want to play - PLEASE HELP
body:
Hey, Im new to the game just started playing about a week ago and I encounter the same problem every time I want to play. I have to delete my L.O.L client, and reinstall a new one, because if i was to open the "old" app it would bounce up and down on my dock and say "application not responding." This is extremely frustrating and I'd like to know if I can do anything to fix it, I enjoy the game a ton and I hope to find a fix ASAP. 

My mac is not old, got it 2015 and its operating system is 10.11.6, everything should be update to date or extremely close to it.

Thank you

replies.body: Save yourself time, money and frustration by simply getting a PC. Mac's are a headache, a waste of money, and are infact inferior despite costing much more for the same thing.

I went ahead and reached out to our tech team. It may be due to MAC having a different installing process. You can find the steps for the [Reinstall Here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040#section-mac). If it doesn't work this time however make sure to submit a [Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) over to our Tech Team for one on one help and further investigation.
its just very inconvenient, because i have to have my laptop stay open with client running all night long :(.
